ygData.subject: Re: Ranger-Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: If you don t have a bard, ranger, shammy or druid available for SOW, or a snarer around, you re still not out of luck with an Intilling Rogue. Get to work on
ygData.messageBody:
If you don't have a bard, ranger, shammy or druid
available for SOW, or a snarer around, you're still not out
of luck with an Intilling Rogue. Get to work on your
poisons!! Get up in skill and make TONS of snare and
slowing poisons-- slap a mob with it and keep trying to
Instill. <br><br>Many rogues don't use poison making, but
if you ever want to solo, this is the skill that
will help you do it. Many different poisons for many
different occassions. The only problem is that poisons of
the same type are not stackable. Not enough rogues
use this skill to complaint on a change for this
though---- : (<br><br>Xela Orcbane<br>39 Druid and Rogue
wannabe<br>Xev<br><br>Rumbl<br>13 Rogue who tries to port<br>Xev
